entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 01:00 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -6.4°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
